MANTRA_SESSION.description: Primary session string for restore. Supports raw creds JSON, base64 JSON, or Mantra~<base64> format.

SESSION_ID.description: Alternative session variable name used by many hosting dashboards. Same format as MANTRA_SESSION.

BOT_NAME.description: Display name used by menu/help messages

BOT_OWNER.description: Owner display name used by menu/help messages

BOT_GITHUB.description: GitHub repo/link shown in alive command

ALIVE_IMG.description: Image URL used by alive command

ALIVE_AUDIO.description: Audio URL used by alive command

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner WhatsApp number in international format (digits only), used for owner-only command checks

OPENWEATHER_API_KEY.description: OpenWeatherMap API key for weather command

AI_ENDPOINT.description: AI endpoint URL(s) for ,ai command. Multiple endpoints can be comma-separated.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Optional OpenAI API key fallback for ,ai command

AI_MODEL.description: Optional OpenAI model for ,ai fallback (default: gpt-4.1-mini)
